    • printMatrix

      public static void printMatrix(int[][] ma, int maxRow, int maxCol)
      Print a Matrix line by line with a "space" as a delimiter.
      Parameters:
      maxRow - maximum possible length of a value in a row (required for correct formatting)
      maxCol - maximum possible length of a value in a column (required for correct formatting)
